meanings.sent1: The heritabilities of eye color and height can be seen in many families.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the heritabilities of different traits to understand genetic influences.
meanings.sent3: The heritabilities of intelligence and creativity make for interesting family discussions.
meanings.sent4: The heritabilities of musical talent seem to flow through their blood.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the heritabilities of certain diseases can help in prevention and treatment.

meanings.definition: The extent to which a trait or characteristic is inherited from one's ancestors.
meanings.sent1: She was curious about the heritabilities of her artistic skills.
meanings.sent2: The heritabilities of physical features can vary greatly among siblings.
meanings.sent3: The heritabilities of a love for gardening seemed to skip a generation.
meanings.sent4: The heritabilities of kindness and compassion were evident in their family tree.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the heritabilities of personality traits can be fascinating.
